GI_CLIENT_ID.description: Google Identity service client id. Format should be 000000000000-ffffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff.apps.googleusercontent.com.

SECRET_KEY.description: The secret key for Django app.

MONGO_URL.description: Connection string for pymongo to connect to mongoDB.

MONGO_DB.description: The database name of MongoDB. Set this when single db is needed, e.g. using mLab MongoDB on Heroku.

PRODUCTION.description: Flag indicates that if the app is in production.

DEBUG.description: Flag indicates that if the app should display debug message / in debug mode.

EMAIL_ACCOUNT.description: Email address/account for sending error report.

EMAIL_PASSWORD.description: Email password for sending error report. Recommended using alternate password for app access.

HEROKU_API_TOKEN.description: Heroku API token for displaying status of the heroku app.

LOGGER.description: Logger(s) configuration. See `note.md` for more details.

LOG_LEVEL.description: Logger(s) configuration, specifically log level. See `note.md` for more details.

HOST_URL.description: The URL of the app. Including protocol. Excluding slash.

SERVICE_SHORT_URL.description: The URL to test the availability of the short service web app. Including protocol. Excluding slash.
